title: 820-00163-A Chimes No Video
message:
Hello!

Macbook Pro Retina 2015

My first time with this 00163 board. No signs of corrosion/liquid damage. 

The computer turns on, chimes  and no video. NO Bloq Mayus acitivity. No video on HDMI port. No video on thunderbolt.
I have flashed a new bios and the problem persisted. 
I reflowed U8400 with my reballing station and same problem. No change. 
What should I measure?

title: 820-00163-A Chimes No Video
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Looks like your board gets blocked after chimes, because failing communication between CPU and GPU.
You should have a bad GPU there; need to change it.

Any sign of USB activity?
Just in case, try to start in safe mode.

title: 820-00163-A Chimes No Video
message:
Hello.

How can check USB activity? USB keyboard?

Should I try to reball the GPU or go directly to change it?

Thanks

title: 820-00163-A Chimes No Video
message:
Read how to properly check USB activity.
Take notes about other tips too...
[URL unfurl="true"]https://boards.rossmanngroup.com/threads/how-to-collection.60974/[/URL]

title: 820-00163-A Chimes No Video
message:
Hello!

I couldnt detect any USB activity, I tried to start on safe mode with its keyboard and with an USB keboard and nothing happened. 

I reballed U8400 but I have the same issue, turns on, chimes but no video.
Tried safe mode and nothing happened. 

Is there anything else I could measure before replacing U8400?

Is there any supplier that you could recomend for this chip? I found this on aliexpress:
 [URL]https://es.aliexpress.com/item/32918176772.html?spm=a2g0o.productlist.0.0.58142023elrDLa&algo_pvid=461eccaa-c7e1-4238-b0c2-b671766f6452&algo_exp_id=461eccaa-c7e1-4238-b0c2-b671766f6452-0&pdp_ext_f=%7B%22sku_id%22%3A%2266655332724%22%7D[/URL]

Thanks!

title: 820-00163-A Chimes No Video
message:
Another question...

Should I try another bios file? I tried with one downloaded from Vinafix.

title: 820-00163-A Chimes No Video
message:
Try this, just in case.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sS7scELcitDOrHkZscIEtW_ZnIRV5xiu/view?usp=sharing[/URL]
Shouldn't be BIOS issue.

Don't waste time with vinafix BIOSes in the future...

title: 820-00163-A Chimes No Video
message:
Hello.
I just received the "new" GPU, replaced it and now the board has video (I can see the folder)  but looks bad. (See attached)

Could it be bad soldering? Or bad GPU?

title: 820-00163-A Chimes No Video
message:
Both cases possible.
Could also be vRAM problem...

title: 820-00163-A Chimes No Video
message:
If there is Samsung vRAM, possibly damaged in rework process.
As the GPU was bought in Aliexpress can also be junk.
You can try to resolder it, just in case...
